2006 contract a deal signed off by
Gianni Infantino when he was a director
at European football's governing body
you wafer with an offshore company
called cross trading it paid sixty
thousand pounds for three years of
broadcast rights for the Champions

Amazonas for almost three times the
price cross trading was owned by father

were indicted by US prosecutors last
year as part of an fbi-led corruption

that as the owners of cost trading they
paid millions of dollars in bribes over
several years to South American football

regional football tournaments in a
statement UEFA said the TV rights were
sold pursuant to an open competitive

Amazonas and cross trading the TV

director there's no suggestion
whatsoever of any way for official or
